amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Employment Eligibility Verification Program by $20 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) for the employment verification program under USCIS by $20 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Marshall amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 358 - 63 (Roll no. 220).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Marshall.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Marshall amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 358 - 63 (Roll no. 220).
